value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|We located Princess Veronica?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes, we found her washed up
on the riverbank. She's in pretty
rough shape.$k$pHer wounds are being treated now.
We won't know what happened until
she regains consciousness.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Even though Askr is at odds with
Embla, I can't help but feel bad
for her...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The real threat would seem to be
Director Letizia and her order.$k$pIf she finds out we have the princess,
she will demand we hand her over.$k$pAnd if we refuse, it's likely things
will escalate, and we'll be unable to
avoid violence.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|People of Askr, I wish you no harm.$k$pI ask only that you deliver Veronica
to us. We will not stand for the
abduction of our princess.$k$pAs long as you hold her captive,
we cannot back down.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You said Princess Veronica was
to stand trial for her crimes, yes?$k$pPlease, help us understand.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pEmbla's internal affairs are not your
concern. This has nothing to do with
you or Askr.$k$pVeronica has been accused of
a crime. It is our charge to find
out whether she is guilty.$k$pThat is all you need to know.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|If fair judgment is your goal, surely
you can offer some piece of evidence
to confirm the merit of the charge.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$pAskran lowlifes...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|H-hey!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Evidence? Charges?! Hah! I could
of course tell you whatever I want,
and you would be none the wiser.$k$pBut how about, instead of all that,
you give Veronica to me now...$k$pOr we will show you the reason they
call us the Curse Directive.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Wait!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_10,0|$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|So, you plan to resist... In that case,
I will depart for now. But I will return!
That you can count on.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh... That's right. I wanted to ask
you something...$k$pWhat was the name of that village
in Askr? The one just south of here?$k$pIt was a beautiful village on a hill...
You know the one, don't you?$k$pIn any case, it's gone now. Alas!
Swallowed by Embla's darkness.
Such a shame...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Don't believe me? I'll allow you the
time to see for yourself. By all means,
I encourage it.$k$pIt's too bad, really. All those villagers,
closed off from the world with no
hope of ever returning...$k$pAnd all because you refused to
give me Veronica.$k$pIf you'll excuse me, I'll give you
time to let reality sink in.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Curse you...$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Our aerial scout has returned.
Even from a distance, the truth
was clear.$k$pThe village is enclosed in a veil
of darkness, just as Director Letizia
said it would be.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|It can't be...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If this continues, the Curse Directive
will close off villages and castles one
by one until...$k$pEven if we can defeat them on the
field, Askr is in incredible danger!$k$p$Sbs150|
